quote: What,"" asked Mr Croup, ""do you want?""""What,"" asked the Marquis de Carabas, a little more rhetorically, ""does anyone want?""""Dead things,"" suggested Mr Vandemar. ""Extra teeth.
quote_letters: WHAT ASKED MR CROUP DO YOU WANTWHAT ASKED THE MARQUIS DE CARABAS A LITTLE MORE RHETORICALLY DOES ANYONE WANTDEAD THINGS SUGGESTED MR VANDEMAR EXTRA TEETH
